column2: Save previous message: pin <name of message>:<name of category (can be empty - then do not write ':')>
Get message by name: get <name of message>:<name of category (can be empty - then do not write ':')>
Delete a message by name: delete <name of message>:<name of category (can be empty - then do not write ':')
Evaluate a mathematical expression with Wolfram Alpha: wolfram <expression>
